00071 typedef struct vp_raw_frame_t
00072 {
00073     int64_t              timestamp; 
00074     //byte               *image;            ///< pointer to image buffer;
00075     frame_modifier_t     *modifier; 
00076     media_sample_t       *sei_list; 
00077     //int32_t                stride;        ///< width of the buffer in bytes (typically aligned by 4 bytes);
00078     vp_frame_t           vp_frame;
00079     int32_t              mediatime; 
00080     int32_t              reserved; 
00081     //Both               lists are used in field coding one list for top and bottom field
00082 } vp_raw_frame_t;
